Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Saint Lawrence
ShortDescription: Revised: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove and 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Logan Square. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Logan Square.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Ogden & 26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kostner, Ogden, then resume their normal route on 26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.
